<item>
  <title>Middle-aged men &apos;seriously damaging health&apos; with excessive alcohol intake </title>
  <link>http://www.standard.co.uk/news/health/middleaged-men-putting-health-at-risk-by-drinking-three-times-recommended-weekly-alcohol-limit-a3246951.html</link>
  <description><![CDATA[Millions of middle-aged men could be seriously damaging their health by drinking almost three times the recommended alcohol limit, according to new research.]]></description>
  <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 07:26:03 +0000</pubDate>
  <guid>a3246951</guid>
  <author>Mark Chandler</author>
  <dc:creator>Mark Chandler</dc:creator>
  <dc:date>2016-05-13T07:26:03+00:00</dc:date>

  <media:content url="http://static.standard.co.uk/s3fs-public/thumbnails/image/2015/10/30/07/alcoholdrinker.jpg" type="image/jpeg"/>
  <media:text>Drinking: Islington borough has the most hospital admissions for alcohol-related conditions than anywhere else in London  (Picture: [copyright])</media:text>
</item>
<item>
  <title>Ellis Downes death: Thames Valley police chief &apos;profoundly&apos; apologises to family for failures over drowned teenager</title>
  <link>http://www.standard.co.uk/news/uk/thames-valley-police-chief-apologises-to-parents-of-drowned-teenager-a3246961.html</link>
  <description><![CDATA[A police chief has said she is "profoundly sorry" for inaction and a lack of compassion for the family of a teenage boy who drowned in the Thames.]]></description>

</item>

  <description><![CDATA[Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned. But sometimes men give it a good go too.
